membership.canceledFreeTrialSecondText: You have cancelled your subscription. Your access to OTRO ends on {nextPayment}.
membership.canceledSubscriptionSecondTex: You have cancelled your subscription. Your access to OTRO ends on {nextPayment}.
membership.freeTrialSecondText: You have a monthly subscription, starting on {nextPayment}.
membership.memberSecondText: You can cancel your subscription at any time and stop your recurring payments. Cancellations must be made at least 24 hours before your next payment date to ensure you are not charged.
membership.paymentMadeOnApple: Your payment was made through the App Store, please visit your iTunes account to manage your subscriptions.
membership.paymentMadeOnGoogle: Your payment was made through Google Play, please visit your Google Play account to manage your subscriptions.
membership.paymentMadeOnWeb: Your payment was made through our website, please go to {url} on any Internet browser and visit your account to manage your subscription.

membership.reactivateTitle: Are you sure you want to reactivate?
myLocker.noBookmarksText: Use the bookmark icon to save stuff to your locker and watch it any time you're connected.
playerList.playerDescription: Tell us who your favourite players are to hear more from them.
product.termsPWA: Payment is charged upon confirmation of purchase or at the end of the free trial (if applicable). Your membership will renew automatically unless you cancel your subscription. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period.
productPayment.authoriseFreeTrialTerms: By clicking Activate free trial you confirm you have permission from the registered card holder. We'll charge you every month unless you cancel your subscription. See the full terms {link}.
productPayment.authoriseTerms: By clicking Pay you confirm you have permission from the registered card holder. We'll charge you every {validityPeriod} unless you cancel your subscription. See the full terms {link}.
profile.invite_friends_description: Know someone who’d love OTRO? Invite them in.
profileSummary.tellUsAbout: Tell us about yourself. Who's your favourite player? Who do you support? Why do you love football? Tell us everything.
purchase.freeTrialConditions: One month free trial {smallWhiteSquareUtf8} Then {price}/month{lineBreak}Cancel anytime
purchase.no_products: There was a problem with loading the products. Please try again.
purchase.termsApple: Payment is charged by iTunes upon confirmation of purchase or at the end of a free trial (if applicable). Your membership will automatically renew unless you cancel your subscription at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Subscriptions may be managed by you and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to your App Store Account Settings after purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.
purchase.termsGoogle: Payment is charged by Google Play upon confirmation of purchase or at the end of a free trial (if applicable). Your membership will automatically renew unless you cancel your subscription at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Subscriptions may be managed by you and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the section ‘Subscriptions’ in Google Play after purchase.The price of a monthly or yearly OTRO membership can be found in the Settings area. The length of the free trial (if available) can be found in the Account section in Settings.

signInEmail.codeHelp: A login code allows you to log into OTRO without creating a password. Enter the code sent in your email and you will be signed in.

signUpWithEmail.magicLinkHelp: A magic link allows you to log into OTRO without creating a password. Clicking on the link automatically signs you in.
signin.threeDevices: You can sign in to OTRO on as many devices as you like, but you only can watch content on a maximum of three.
